pageContext.description: A. Not quite round at thickest end, but the pointed end is practically round. B.  Is hollow, although the others seem to be solid. C. Has a coppery appearance.
pageContext.surface: A. Rough all over + a patina of greyish green which is rough as through soil is encrusted with it + whitish patches. B. Slightly rough through corrosion, which is thin - but nearly coveres the surface. Light greyish green patina. C. Rough nearly all over - caused by soil encrusted with a patina of greyish green. This is chipped off where thin near point, showing a dark brown coppery surface.
pageContext.collection: Private Collection,of Late Lord Amherst of Hackney, FSA,Sotheby's 17.vi.21, Lot 827
pageContext.toSearch: Amarna, Tall Bani Omran, Deir Mawas, Menia Governorate, Egypt
